items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: A red liquid that glimmers when agitated. Drinking this potion restores 2d4+2 hit points.

items.name: Potion of Greater Healing
items.description: A bright red liquid that pulses with energy. Drinking this potion restores 4d4+4 hit points.

items.name: Longsword
items.description: A versatile blade favored by warriors and knights.

items.name: Shortsword
items.description: A quick blade perfect for precise strikes.

items.name: Longbow
items.description: A tall bow for ranged combat, requiring strength to draw.

items.name: Leather Armor
items.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by boiling in oil.

items.name: Chain Mail
items.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath.

items.name: Shield
items.description: A wooden shield reinforced with metal.

items.name: Torch
items.description: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius.

items.name: Rope, Hemp (50 feet)
items.description: A sturdy hemp rope useful for climbing and binding.
